recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy chicken stir fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender
Stir in soy sauce, salt, and pepper
